qunit-xbrowser:test

Full name:

com.storyiq.oss:qunit-xbrowser-maven-plugin:0.2-SNAPSHOT:test

Description:

Runs JavaScript units tests with QUnit in the specified Web browser.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: test.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
browser Browser - The web browser to use for Unit Testing.
<browser>
 <name>firefox</name>
</browser>
port int - The port for running HTTP access to the JavaScript files. When not specified the default will be 4200.
Default value is: 4200.
sourcePaths Mapping[] - The source directories containing the JavaScript code under test and any dependencies.
testSourceContext String - The HTTP URL that the QUnit test source directory should be mapped to. Defaults to the root e.g. "http://localhost/"
Default value is: /.
testSourceDirectory File - The source directory containing the QUnit test files. Defaults to "${basedir}/src/test/javascript"
Default value is: ${basedir}/src/test/javascript.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
excludes String[] - A list of <exclude> elements specifying the tests (by pattern) that should be excluded from testing.
includes String[] - A list of <include> elements specifying the tests (by pattern) that should be included in testing. When not specified the default includes will be
<includes>
 <include>**/Test*.html</include>
 <include>**/*Test.html</include>
</includes>
reportDirectory File - The directory for publishing test results
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/qunit.
skip boolean - Set this to "true" to bypass JavaScript Unit tests entirely.
Default value is: false.

Parameter Details

browser:

The web browser to use for Unit Testing.
<browser>
 <name>firefox</name>
</browser>
  • Type: com.storyiq.mavenplugin.qunit.Browser
  • Required: Yes

excludes:

A list of <exclude> elements specifying the tests (by pattern) that should be excluded from testing.
  • Type: java.lang.String[]
  • Required: No

includes:

A list of <include> elements specifying the tests (by pattern) that should be included in testing. When not specified the default includes will be
<includes>
 <include>**/Test*.html</include>
 <include>**/*Test.html</include>
</includes>
  • Type: java.lang.String[]
  • Required: No

port:

The port for running HTTP access to the JavaScript files. When not specified the default will be 4200.
  • Type: int
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${qunit.http.port}
  • Default: 4200

reportDirectory:

The directory for publishing test results
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/qunit

skip:

Set this to "true" to bypass JavaScript Unit tests entirely.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${maven.test.skip}
  • Default: false

sourcePaths:

The source directories containing the JavaScript code under test and any dependencies.
  • Type: com.storyiq.mavenplugin.qunit.Mapping[]
  • Required: Yes

testSourceContext:

The HTTP URL that the QUnit test source directory should be mapped to. Defaults to the root e.g. "http://localhost/"
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: /

testSourceDirectory:

The source directory containing the QUnit test files. Defaults to "${basedir}/src/test/javascript"
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ${basedir}/src/test/javascript
